title: CSS accessible multi-level dropdown hover navigation menu
teaser: While clickable menus are often a better solution, sometimes you will need to use the hover style instead. Thanks to the :focus-within psuedo selector, this is easier than ever.

teaser: And add a touch of JavaScript to randomly load new images in the grid.

title: How to build a color palette for the backdrop of a user interface
teaser: It’s tempting to combine a few flat grayscale shades together and call it a day. But it’s way more fun to create your own. It’s not that hard, and can add a touch of character to your UI.

title: Notes on color
teaser: Assigning colors to stuff is hard. It’s messy. It’s emotional. It’s subjective. It’s worth it. Here are a few things to keep in mind.

teaser: They want to help and feel like a part of the family.

title: How to Use Curly Quotes on Mac OSX and Windows
